22.14: cvj maaib zyepg taub i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei pyeiq zeiq Zauj Jyenq ninb mivb. mrud taub yaag zruj i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei puvb pwrng Eei yetg taub pyeiq zeiq.
22.23: sij kxvq yia Bua Zeij yia Bua kanb Eei ziab txvb weig kwavg maiq kan zyruq, fai yia Bua zx'q puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq, fai fovg hxg Eei laavb zi'g, fai ziag weig Jiu Tov Eei ka'naaiq, an ziab txvb puaq ziag nx, Toq zyruq kanb tivg yia Bua Eei zwid.
22.6: yo-su-waa zyrug pwav waag ninb Bua yaag heug ninb Bua Rwrnj. ninb Bua zyrug Rwrnj ninb Bua kanb Eei pyauq mig a'q.
22.34: lu-Ben myenb Zauj kaatg myenb Tevj uaq nxm ziab txvb Zwrtq Buaj heug, ‘zxvb zevj Eei ziab txvb.’  ninb Bua kxvq, “naaiq nxm ziab txvb yem Bua Bu'Dovj zruj zxvb zevj, zyruq se Tinb huvb.”
22.2: kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, “zyruq Eei pru, mo-se, Paaiq meib Bua zruj Eei yetg zuvq meib Bua ei Jyenq zruj. yia Paaiq Eei yetg zuvq meib Bua yaag mwavj Revg.
22.20: ze-laa Eei fun, aa-Kaan, maiq zyepg zua'q Eei fovg hxg hxpg zu'g fuvj tavj pun zyruq Eei ka'naaiq uaq zang, i-saa-laa-en Eei zwavj myenb zu'g zyruq nrud. laaij ninb paamd Eei zwid maiq taan ninb kanb Du'g taub zu'g myetg Navq.’+”
22.24: “zuvq maiq zeid! yia Bua Navq naaiq nx zruj weig zu'g yia Bua Raub heij Ga'haaq hivq meib Bua Eei zeib fun haib Buaj yia Bua Eei zeib fun, ‘meib Bua Zauj zyruq, i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Tinb huvb, maaib haiq Euvg kwen zu'g?
22.28: “yia Bua Namq taaib, sij kxvq Ga'haaq hivq maaib haiq taub Navq naaiq nx kxvq Buaj yia Bua fai yia Bua Eei zeib fun nx, yia Bua zyrug haib kxvq, ‘mavg maa'b! naaiq se zyruq Eei ziab txvb Eei Euvg zeiq Navq. yia Bua Eei ovb Taaij Zeij taaib maiq zeid weig fovg hxg puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq fai txb haiq Euvg mivb ziag, se weig yem yia Bua Zauj meib Bua Bu'Dovj zruj zxvb zevj.’
22.7: mo-se Jiu Baa-saan teig pun maa-natq-sej Daamb fivj myenb weig penj ninb Bua Eei pwrng, mq paag maaib maa-natq-sej Daamb fivj yo-su-waa Jiu pun ninb Bua Eei pwrng yem Jx-Dcn Daaib fai puv mcvj, nitq Jyenq uaq teij kanb fivj i-saa-laa-en myenb. yo-su-waa heug ninb Bua Rwrnj pyauq uaq zang, ninb pwav waag pun ninb Bua.
22.29: “yia Bua Dovg haaij zuvq maiq maaib Hruq vcvg zyruq fai ib Nxi kwavg ninb Zivj Zeij kanb nxm ziab txvb weig fovg hxg puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq fai ziag Eei laavb zi'g fai haiq Euvg ziag Eei ka'naaiq. Zwrtq liud yem zyruq, yia Bua Eei Tinb huvb, Eei ziab txvb nx, se yem ninb Eei Dopg liub Ra'Myen Eei ziab txvb, yia Bua maiq Zeij kanb nxm a'q.”
22.19: sij kxvq meib Bua Eei teib puv maaib wij nx, kunq Jiaj taaib yem zyruq Eei teib puv, se lyepg zavg zyruq Eei Dopg liub Eei teib puv, yem yia Bua Bu'Dovj Ripg meib Bua Eei pwrng maa'b! mq paag Toq meib Bua maiq tuvq vcvg zyruq, yaag maiq tuvq vcvg yia Bua, zyrug weig meib Bua kanb Zeij ziab txvb, Zwrtq liud zyruq, Bua Eei Tinb huvb Eei ziab txvb.
22.17: Bua yem pe-o paamd Eei zwid, weig Bua Zxg maiq kcvb kauj fai? Tauj ib zang Bua Zxg saaj kanb maiq kcvb Zivb Revg, maiq kunq zyruq Eei zwavj myenb zu'g ze'g naang hxig.
22.31: e-le-aa-saa sai myenb Eei txn, fi-ne-hatg, kxvq Buaj lu-Ben myenb, kaatg myenb Zauj maa-natq-sej myenb, “ib Nxi yia Bua hiuq tu'q zyruq yem Bua Bu'Dovj, weig zu'g meib Bua maiq vcvg zyruq. ib zang meib Bua Fruj i-saa-laa-en myenb pyauj Dutq, maiq zu'g zyruq tivg zwid a'q.”
22.30: fi-ne-hatg sai myenb Zauj zwavj pc'g fivj Eei pyeiq zeiq, tovb Zauj ninb yem uaq teij i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei puvb pwrng pyeiq zeiq, haid liud lu-Ben myenb, kaatg myenb Zauj maa-natq-sej myenb Eei waag, ninb Bua haid hxpg Hruq haig.
22.27: naaiq se weig yem yia Bua Zauj meib Bua Bu'Dovj zruj zxvb zevj, yaag weig Bua hod paan myenb zruj zxvb zevj, pun Ziv yia Bua fub suj zyruq, yem ninb Eei Ra'Myen txb fovg hxg puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq, Euvb Euvg ziag Eei ka'naaiq Zauj ziag weig Jiu Tov Eei ka'naaiq mivb ziag pun zyruq. Navq naaig, Ga'haaq hivq meib Bua Eei zeib fun maiq haib kxvq Buaj yia Bua Eei zeib fun, ‘meib Bua maiq maaib meib Bua Eei pwrng zavg zyruq. ’
22.11: i-saa-laa-en myenb haid kxvq, “lu-Ben myenb, kaatg myenb Zauj maa-natq-sej Daamb fivj myenb Zeij nxm ziab txvb yem Kaa-naa-an teib puv Eei kapg Jaaij ka'Euad, yem i-saa-laa-en myenb naaiq puv, nitq Jx-Dcn Daaib, ke-li-lotq uaq.”
22.5: meib Bua xij zu'g faij fim, ei Jyenq zyruq Eei pru, mo-se, Jiu pun meib Bua Eei leib latg Zauj leid. se xij zu'g Namq zyruq, meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb, ei Revg ninb Eei za'eij, kan ninb Eei leib latg, Kauj wrnq ninb, yaag xij zu'g lovg Revg Hruq, lovg Revg za'eij fub suj ninb.”
22.9: Navq naaig, lu-Ben myenb, kaatg myenb Zauj maa-natq-sej Daamb fivj myenb yem Kaa-naa-an teib puv, si-lo muvq, leib Gxi i-saa-laa-en myenb. ninb Bua Rwrnj ki-le-aatg teig, tovb zyruq lovg mo-se Paaiq penj ninb Bua Eei teib puv.
22.16: “zyruq Eei myenb yetg zuvq kapq zunq kxvq, ‘meib Bua weig haiq tiug zruj naaiq teij waaig sig paamd i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Tinb huvb? ib Nxi meib Bua weig haiq tiug kwavg zyruq, weig kanb Zeij nxm ziab txvb vcvg Jyenq zyruq?
22.4: ib zang zyruq, meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb, ziuj ninb lcvd Eei waag pun meib Bua Eei kxb yrud tu'q Taaib pcvb. weig naaiq meib Bua kunq Rwrnj meib Bua kanb Eei pyauq, tovb zyruq Eei pru, mo-se, Paaiq pun meib Bua Ripg Eei pwrng teib puv, yem Jx-Dcn Daaib tov puv mcvj.
22.10: ninb Bua Rwrnj Tauj ke-li-lotq, yem Kaa-naa-an teib puv ka'Euad nitq Jx-Dcn Daaib, lu-Ben myenb, kaatg myenb Zauj maa-natq-sej Daamb fivj myenb yem Jx-Dcn Daaib Len Zeij nxm ziab txvb, yrug Lo yrug Lav.
22.22: “Tinb huvb se nrnb Jiaj uaq taub. ninb se zyruq. Tinb huvb se nrnb Jiaj uaq taub. ninb se zyruq. ninb hiuq a'q. i-saa-laa-en myenb yaag xij zu'g hiuq. sij kxvq yia Bua vcvg zyruq fai zruj Hruq maiq zivj pun zyruq nx, ib Nxi maiq tuvq lyrub yia Bua Eei mcvg a'q.
22.12: i-saa-laa-en myenb haid kxvq Navq naaig, zwavj myenb zyrug kapq zunq yem si-lo muvq, xij mivb Zauj ninb Bua Bx'q Jaaj.
22.15: ninb Bua mivb Tauj ki-le-aatg teig, lu-Ben myenb, kaatg myenb Zauj maa-natq-sej Daamb fivj myenb uaq zyrug kxvq,
22.13: i-saa-laa-en myenb Paaiq e-le-aa-saa sai myenb Eei txn, fi-ne-hatg, mivb ki-le-aatg teig lxd lu-Ben myenb, kaatg myenb Zauj maa-natq-sej Daamb fivj myenb.
22.1: uaq zang yo-su-waa heug lu-Ben myenb, kaatg myenb Zauj maa-natq-sej Daamb fivj myenb taaib,
22.26: “weig naaiq yia Bua Zivj taaib kxvq, ‘Bua xij zu'g Zeij nxm ziab txvb, maiq zeid weig puaq ziag Eei ka'naaiq fai fovg hxg ziag haiq Euvg ka'naaiq.’
22.25: zyruq tivg zyavj Jx-Dcn Daaib zruj yia Bua Zauj meib Bua Eei kapg Jaaij mig a'q. meib Bua lu-Ben myenb, kaatg myenb aag, meib Bua Zauj zyruq maiq maaib meib Bua Eei pwrng.’ Navq naaig meib Bua Eei zeib fun haib zruj pun yia Bua Eei zeib fun kwavg, maiq zavg zyruq.

12.18: aa-fekq zivb yetg taub laa-saa-lon zivb yetg taub
12.8: se Bovb aiq txvj, la'aiq txvj, aa-laa-Baa teig, keb zxv, teib puvb Waav Zauj ne-kepg. naaiq se hitq-Tai myenb, aa-mo-lai myenb, Kaa-naa-an myenb, pe-litq-si myenb, hi-wai myenb Zauj ye-Butg myenb Eei teib puv.
12.3: ninb yaag kunq Jx-Dcn Daaib tov puv Eei aa-laa-Baa teig yem Kin-ne-letq Kxib txn Fiag mivb Tauj aa-laa-Baa Kxiq, se Kxib Rauq, mivb Tauj Betg-ye-si-motq zivb Fiag naamb puv Tauj pitg-kaa Bovb Jua'q.
12.21: Taa-aa-naakq zivb yetg taub me-kitg-Do zivb yetg taub
12.14: ho-maa zivb yetg taub aa-laatq zivb yetg taub
12.23: yem naa-fotq-Do-aa Eei Do-aa zivb yetg taub yem kaa-li-liEei ko-yim zivb yetg taub
12.6: zyruq Eei pru, mo-se, Zauj i-saa-laa-en myenb Bx'q hivb ninb Bua. zyruq Eei pru, mo-se, yaag zx'q ninb Bua Eei teib puv Jiu pun lu-Ben myenb, kaatg myenb Zauj Daamb fivj maa-natq-sej myenb, penj ninb Bua Ripg Eei pwrng.
12.2: aa-mo-lai myenb Eei si-honj huvb yem hetq-Bon zivb. ninb kunq Eei teib puv yem aan-non hxvb Len, aa-lo-e zivb, se yem uaq nxm hxvd Bu'Dovj mivb Tauj yapq-Bxkg Daaib, am-mon myenb Eei kapg Jaaij, se yetg pwrng ki-le-aatg teig.
12.20: sim-lon-me-lon muvq yetg taub akg-saapq zivb yetg taub
12.24: Ti-laa-saa zivb yetg taub yetg zuvq kapq Jyenq maaib faab zyepg yetq taub huvb.
12.7: taauj naaiq mivb kxvq Tauj yo-su-waa Zauj i-saa-laa-en myenb yem Jx-Dcn Daaib fai puv mcvj Bx'q hivb Eei huvb tiaj. ninb Bua Eei teib puv yem le-Baa-nxn hxvd, Baa-an-kaatg muvq, mivb Tauj sej-i teig, haa-lakq Bov. yo-su-waa zx'q naaiq nxm teib puv ziuj i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei fivj Paaiq pun Gxi penj ninb Bua Ripg Eei pwrng,
12.19: maa-Don zivb yetg taub haa-so zivb yetg taub
12.17: Tapq-pu-waa muvq yetg taub he-fe muvq yetg taub
12.11: yaan-mutq zivb yetg taub laa-Kitq zivb yetg taub
12.5: ninb kunq he-mon Bov Zauj saaj-le-Kaa zivb, cvj kunq Revg Baa-saan teig mivb Tauj ke-su myenb Zauj maa-aa-Kaa myenb Eei kapg Jaaij, se yetg pwrng ki-le-aatg teig Tauj hetq-Bon zivb Eei huvb, si-honj, Eei kapg Jaaij.
12.9: ye-li-Ko zivb yetg taub ai zivb, (nitq Betg-en zivb) yetg taub
12.16: makq-Ke-Daa zivb yetg taub Betg-en zivb yetg taub
12.4: Baa-saan teig Eei okg huvb, se yetg taub zevg Fiag Eei le-faa-im myenb. ninb yem atg-Taa-lotq zivb Zauj e-Den-i zivb.
12.10: ye-lu-saa-lem zivb yetg taub he-Bo-lon zivb yetg taub
12.22: Ke-Detg zivb yetg taub yem Kaan-men Eei yokq-ne-am muvq yetg taub
12.12: ekg-lon zivb yetg taub ke-se zivb yetg taub
12.15: lipq-naa zivb yetg taub aa-Dun-lam zivb yetg taub
12.13: De-Bi zivb yetg taub ke-De zivb yetg taub
12.1: taauj naaiq mivb kxvq i-saa-laa-en myenb yem Jx-Dcn Daaib tov puv mcvj Bx'q hivb cvj Zaavq tu'q ninb Bua Eei teib puv uaq teij huvb, se yem aan-non hxvd mivb Tauj he-mon Bov, lyemb yetg zuvq aa-laa-Baa teig tov puv mcvj.

15.18: Zwrtq kcvb uaq zang akg-saaj heug ninb Eei Goj, otg-ni-en, Tevj ninb Eei tia Toq livb teig. akg-saaj zyrug yem lxb ti'g taand Fiag taaib. Kaa-lepq naaig ninb Eei sia'q, “meib xij lovg haiq Euvg?”
15.45: maaib e-Ko-lon zivb Zauj uaq nxm zivb Eei laavd Zauj fiub laavd,
15.3: Rwid Fiag aakg-lapq-Bim Bovb Qavj Eei naamb puv mcvj, cvj Jiaj mivb Tauj sin teib puvb Waav, Kaa-Detg-Baa-nia Eei naamb puv mcvj. kapg Jaaij cvj Jiaj hetq-lon zivb Zcvj faauj atg-Daa muvq, cvj vau mivb Tauj Kaan-Kaa laavd,
15.14: Kaa-lepq zyrug yem he-Bo-lon zivb zung aa-naakq myenb, se-sai, aa-hi-maan Zauj Tan-mai Zwrtq, se aa-naakq Eei pua taub zeib fun.
15.48: yem Bovb aiq txvj maaib saa-mi, yaatq-Ti, soj-Ko,
15.2: uaq Diaq naamb puv mcvj Eei kapg Jaaij yem Kxib Rauq tweib mweid, Kxib Zovj Eei txvj,
15.36: saa-aa-laa-im, aa-Di-Taa-im, ke-De-laa, Zauj ke-De-lo-Taa-im. yetg zuvq maaib zyepg feij nxm zivb Zauj uaq teij zivb Eei fiub laavd.
15.61: yem teib puvb Waav Eei zivb maaib Betg-aa-laa-Baa, mitq-Din, sej-Kaa-Kaa,
15.7: kapg Jaaij cvj yem aa-Ko hxvd Zcvj faauj pa'q puv Tauj De-Bi zivb, cvj vau mivb Tauj kin-kaan. kin-kaan yem aa-Dum-mim Bovb Qavj uaq nxm hxvd Eei naamb puv mcvj txib vaang. kapg Jaaij taauj Jyenq mivb Tauj en-se-metq uamb zivq, mivb Jomg en-lo-ken.
15.17: Kaa-lepq Eei yrud, Ke-natq Eei txn, otg-ni-en, Bx'q tu'q uaq nxm zivb. Kaa-lepq zyrug zx'q ninb Eei sia'q, akg-saaj, pun otg-ni-en lovg zruj auq.
15.11: kapg Jaaij cvj mivb Tauj e-Ko-lon zivb pa'q puv Bovb Len, vau mivb sikq-Ke-lon muvq, Jiaj mivb Tauj Baa-aa-laa Bov, cvj mivb Tauj yapq-ne-en muvq, mivb setq uaq Kxiq.
15.33: yem fai puv mcvj Bovb aiq txvj maaib etg-Taa-on, soj-laa, atg-naa,
15.16: Kaa-lepq kxvq, “haiq taub Bx'q tu'q Ki-li-yaatq-sej-fe, yaag Zaavq tu'q uaq nxm zivb nx, yia lcvd pun yia Eei sia'q, akg-saaj, ninb zruj auq.”
15.59: maa-aa-laatq, Be-Taa-notq Zauj en-Te-Ko-lon. yetg zuvq maaib Ju'q nxm zivb Zauj uaq teij zivb Eei fiub laavd.
15.4: taauj Jyenq mivb Tauj atg-mon muvq, Zwrtq mivb Tauj i-yipq Do'q cvj Zamj Jyenq uaq Kxiq. naaiq se ninb Bua naamb puv mcvj Eei kapg Jaaij.
15.51: ko-sen, ho-lon Zauj ki-lon. yetg zuvq maaib zyepg yetq nxm zivb Zauj uaq teij zivb Eei fiub laavd.
15.62: nipq-saan, zivb Rauq Zauj en-ke-Di zivb. kapq Jyenq maaib Ju'q nxm zivb Zauj uaq teij zivb Eei fiub laavd.
15.12: fai puv Eei kapg Jaaij se tomb Kxiq Eei Kxib Len. naaiq se yu-Daa myenb Eei kapg Jaaij ziuj ninb Bua Eei puvb pwrng.
15.46: yem e-Ko-lon zivb mivb Tauj Kxib Len, Zauj yem nitq atg-Dotg zivb Eei yetg zuvq zivb Zauj Jyenq uaq teij zivb Eei fiub laavd,
15.13: ziuj zyruq Paaiq yo-su-waa Eei waag, ninb zx'q kruq yu-Daa myenb Eei Dau Jiu pun ye-fun-ne Eei txn, Kaa-lepq. ninb Paaiq Eei se Ki-li-yaatq-aan-Baa zivb, tovb he-Bo-lon zivb. aan-Baa se aa-naakq Eei tia.
15.54: hum-Taa, Ki-li-yaatq-aan-Baa, se he-Bo-lon, yaag maaib si-yo. kapq Jyenq maaib Duab nxm zivb Zauj uaq teij zivb Eei fiub laavd.
15.63: mq paag ye-Butg myenb Zxg yem ye-lu-saa-lem zivb. yu-Daa myenb zung ninb Bua maiq Zwrtq. weig naaiq ye-Butg myenb Zivj taaib Zauj yu-Daa myenb yem naaig Tauj ib Jaaj Nxi.
15.8: kapg Jaaij cvj Zcvj faauj mivb yavb Ben-hin-nom hxvd kan ye-Butg myenb Eei zivb, ye-lu-saa-lem, Eei naamb puv mcvj. yem naaig faauj hin-nom hxvd fai puv mcvj Eei Bovb nivq, Tauj le-faa-im hxvd pa'q puv mcvj Jomg.
15.9: kapg Jaaij yavb Bovb nivq huvj Jyenq mivb Tauj nepq-To-aa uamb zivq, cvj Zwrtq nitq e-fo-lon Bov uaq teij zivb. yem naaig kapg Jaaij cvj vau mivb Tauj Baa-aa-laa zivb, se Ki-li-yaatq-ye-aa-lim.
15.32: le-Baa-otg, sin-him, aa-yin Zauj lim-mon zivb. yetg zuvq maaib Eig zyepg Juaq nxm zivb Zauj Jyenq uaq teij zivb Eei fiub laavd.
15.21: yu-Daa myenb Eei zivb, tovb yem uaq Diaq naamb puv mcvj Jomg ne-kepg, se yem nitq e-Dom teib puv Eei kapg Jaaij, maaib Kapg-se-en, e-De, yaa-kun,
15.57: Kaa-in, ki-Be-aa Zauj Tim-naa-haa. yetg zuvq maaib zyepg nxm zivb Zauj uaq teij zivb Eei fiub laavd.
15.6: Rwid mivb Tauj Betg-hokq-laa muvq, yavb Betg-aa-laa-Baa laavd Eei pa'q puv mivb Tauj lu-Ben Eei txn, Bo-han, Eei la'pyeib zxv.
15.44: Ke-i-laa, akg-sipq Zauj maa-le-saa. yetg zuvq maaib Duab nxm zivb Zauj Jyenq uaq teij zivb Eei fiub laavd.
15.20: taauj naaiq mivb kxvq yu-Daa myenb ziuj ninb Bua Eei puvb pwrng Ripg Eei pwrng teib puv.
15.5: tov puv Eei kapg Jaaij yavb Kxib Rauq mivb Tauj Jx-Dcn Daaib Kuq. pa'q puv mcvj Eei kapg Jaaij yem Kxib Zovj, Jx-Dcn Daaib Kuq,
15.19: ninb Eei sia'q tau, “Toq aa tia pun zivb Eeig yia. Toq pun uamb zivq yia, weig zu'g meib pun yia uaq teij Dau Gaai haig.” Kaa-lepq zyrug Paaiq uaq Jiaj Eei uamb zivq Zauj uaq Diaq Eei uamb zivq pun ninb.
15.60: Ki-li-yaatq-Baa-an, se Ki-li-yaatq-ye-aa-lim, Zauj lapq-Baa zivb, penj i nxm zivb Zauj uaq teij zivb Eei fiub laavd.
15.41: ke-De-lotq, Betg-Daa-kon, naa-aa-maa, Zauj makq-Ke-Daa. yetg zuvq maaib zyepg lua'g nxm zivb Zauj Jyenq uaq teij zivb Eei fiub laavd.
15.1: Paaiq pun yu-Daa fivj ziuj ninb Bua Eei puvb pwrng tu'q Eei Dau Fiag naamb puv taauj Jyenq e-Dom teib puv Eei kapg Jaaij, se Tauj sin teib puvb Waav naamb puv mcvj, ko Jiaj Eei txvj.
15.47: atg-Dotg zivb Zauj weib kxmj Eei laavd Zauj fiub laavd, kaa-saa zivb Zauj uaq nxm zivb Eei laavd Zauj fiub laavd, mivb Tauj i-yipq Do'q, yaag Jiaj Tauj tomb Kxiq, lyemb tomb Kxiq Eei Kxib Len.
15.10: Ga'haaq cvj yem Baa-aa-laa zivb vau mivb fai puv mcvj Tauj sej-i Bov, yavb ye-laa-lim Bovb Len pa'q puv Jiaj, se Ke-saa-lon zivb, Fiag Tauj Betg-se-metq zivb cvj Jiaj Tim-naa-haa zivb.
15.15: ninb yem naaig Zwrtq mivb Bx'q De-Bi zivb Eei myenb. De-Bi zivb zinb Daavg heug Ki-li-yaatq-sej-fe.

13.18: yaag maaib yaa-haatq zivb, Ke-De-motq zivb Zauj me-faa-aatg zivb,
13.8: zevg uaq teij maa-natq-sej Daamb fivj Zauj lu-Ben fivj Zauj kaatg fivj Ripg Eei Dau yem Jx-Dcn Daaib tov puv mcvj ziuj zyruq Eei pru, mo-se, Paaiq pun ninb Bua Eei pwrng.
13.33: mq paag mo-se maiq Paaiq Ripg Eei pwrng pun le-wi fivj. zyruq, i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Tinb huvb, se ninb Bua Ripg Eei pwrng ziuj zyruq Buaj Jiaj ninb Bua Eei waag.
13.3: yem i-yipq teib puv Eei tov puv mcvj, si-hoj Daaib mivb pa'q puv mcvj Tauj e-Ko-lon zivb Eei kapg Jaaij. yetg zuvq funj penj Kaa-naa-an myenb Eei teib puv. kunq fi-li-saa-tia myenb uaq teij pyaa taub tomb Jyen yem kaa-saa zivb, atg-Dotg zivb, atg-Ke-lon zivb, katg zivb, e-Ko-lon zivb, yaag maaib apg-wim myenb Eei teib puv,
13.32: naaiq se mo-se yem mo-apg Daub pcvb Jx-Dcn Daaib Zauj ye-li-Ko zivb Eei tov puv mcvj Paaiq pun myenb Ripg Eei pwrng.
13.21: se yem uaq nxm txvj Eei Daub pcvb Eei yetg zuvq zivb, Zauj aa-mo-lai myenb Eei si-honj huvb yem hetq-Bon zivb kunq Eei yetg zuvq kua'q. mo-se Bx'q hivb ninb, lyemb mi-Dyen fivj Eei pyeiq zeiq, e-wi, le-Kem, suj-aa, hu-aa Zauj le-Baa. naaiq teij pyeiq zeiq zinb Daavg yem uaq nxm teib puv kwei si-honj huvb kunq.
13.14: mq paag mo-se maiq Paaiq Dau pun le-wi fivj zruj ninb Bua Ripg Eei pwrng. ninb Bua Ripg Eei pwrng se lovg trud puaq ziag fovg hxg pun zyruq, i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei Tinb huvb, Eei ka'naaiq, Navq zyruq Zauj ninb Bua lcvd Jiaj Eei waag nx.
13.23: lu-Ben fivj Eei teib puv fai puv mcvj Eei kapg Jaaij se Jx-Dcn Daaib. naaiq teij zivb Zauj laavd penj lu-Ben myenb ziuj ninb Bua Eei puvb pwrng tu'q Ripg Eei pwrng.
13.6: “Bovb aiq txvj Eei yetg zuvq myenb yem le-Baa-nxn keb mivb Tauj mitq-le-fotq-maa-im, se sai-Dxn Eei yetg zuvq myenb, yia kanb xij yem i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei uaq Daavg mcvj zung ninb Bua Zwrtq mivb. kunq ziuj yia Paaiq zyavj meib zx'q naaiq teij Dau pun Gxi penj i-saa-laa-en myenb Ripg Eei pwrng.
13.2: “Zxg xij zu'g Rcv Eei teib puv maaib fi-li-saa-tia myenb Zauj ke-su myenb Eei yetg zuvq teib puv,
13.20: cvj maaib Betg-pe-o, pitg-kaa Bov faauj Jiaj Eei txvj Zauj Betg-ye-si-motq zivb,
13.24: mo-se ziuj kaatg fivj Eei puvb pwrng Paaiq Dau penj ninb Bua Ripg Eei pwrng.
13.28: naaiq teij zivb Zauj laavd penj kaatg myenb ziuj ninb Bua Eei puvb pwrng tu'q Ripg Eei pwrng.
13.7: ib zang meib xij zu'g Paaiq naaiq teij Dau pun Gxi naaiq teij Duab fivj Zauj maa-natq-sej Daamb fivj penj ninb Bua Ripg Eei pwrng.”
13.29: mo-se yaag zx'q Ripg Eei pwrng Dau pun maa-natq-sej Daamb fivj ziuj maa-natq-sej Daamb fivj Eei puvb pwrng Paaiq pun Gxi.
13.19: maaib Ki-li-yaa-Taa-im, sipg-maa, Zauj yem uaq nxm hxvd Eei Bovb aiq, ze-e-letq-saa-haaj zivb.
13.17: lyemb hetq-Bon zivb Zauj yem hetq-Bon Daub pcvb Eei nxmb nxm zivb, Di-Bon zivb, Baa-motq-Baa-an zivb Zauj Betg-Baa-an-me-on zivb,
13.31: cvj maaib yetg pwrng ki-le-aatg teig Zauj atg-Taa-lotq Zauj e-Den-i, se kwei Baa-saan teig Eei okg huvb Eei tomb zivb. naaiq teij zivb Paaiq pun maa-natq-sej Eei txn, maa-Ki Eei zeib fun, se pun yetg pwrng maa-Ki myenb ziuj ninb Bua Eei puvb pwrng.
13.30: ninb Bua Eei kapg Jaaij yem maa-haa-naa-im zivb, weib kxmj yetg zuvq Baa-saan teig, se tovb Baa-saan teig Eei okg huvb Eei yetg zuvq kua'q. yem Baa-saan teig yaag maaib Jaa-i Eei lua'g zyepg nxm laavd.
13.27: yaag maaib hxvd ka'Euad Eei Betg-haa-lam muvq, Betg-nim-laa muvq, sukg-Kotq muvq, saaj-fon Zauj hetq-Bon zivb Eei si-honj huvb Eei kua'q zevg Fiag Eei teib puv. fai puv Eei kapg Jaaij se Jx-Dcn Daaib yaag kan Jyenq Daaib mivb pa'q puv Tauj Kin-ne-letq Kxib txn uaq Diaq wrng.
13.11: yaag maaib ki-le-aatg teig Zauj ke-su myenb Zauj maa-aa-Kaa myenb Eei teig, lyemb he-mon Bov yetg zuvq Zauj Baa-saan teig yetg zuvq mivb Tauj saaj-le-Kaa muvq.
13.5: yaag maaib ke-Baan myenb Eei teib puv, Zauj mivb tov puv mcvj yetg zuvq le-Baa-nxn teig yem he-mon Bovb Jua'q, Baa-an-kaatg muvq, mivb Tauj pia'g haa-matq zivb Eei txvj.
13.9: maaib yem aan-non hxvb Len Eei aa-lo-e zivb, Zauj hxvd ka'Euad Eei zivb, lyemb me-De-Baa yetg zuvq Daub pcvb mivb Tauj Di-Bon zivb.
13.16: ninb Bua Eei kapg Jaaij se yem aan-non hxvb Len Eei aa-lo-e zivb Zauj yem hxvd ka'Euad Eei zivb Zauj weib kxmj me-De-Baa zivb Eei Daub pcvb,
13.4: se naamb puv mcvj Kaa-naa-an myenb Eei yetg zuvq teib puv, Zauj sai-Dxn myenb Eei teib puv yem me-aa-laa mivb Tauj aa-fekq zivb, cvj mivb Tauj aa-mo-lai myenb Eei kapg Jaaij.
13.10: yaag maaib yem hetq-Bon zivb kunq aa-mo-lai myenb uaq taub si-honj huvb Eei nxmb nxm zivb mivb Tauj am-mon myenb Eei kapg Jaaij.
13.22: i-saa-laa-en myenb lovg Ru'g Daauq taij myenb uaq zang, lyemb Be-o Eei txn, uaq taub mavg mcvg myenb, Baa-laa-am, yaag zu'g Zauj Jyenq taij taig.
13.12: cvj maaib Baa-saan teig Eei okg huvb kunq Eei zyavb nxm kua'q. ninb yem atg-Taa-lotq zivb Zauj e-Den-i zivb kunq. le-faa-im myenb Kuvj zevg ninb kanb Du'g taub Navq. naaiq teij myenb yetg zuvq mo-se Bx'q hivb cvj zung ninb Bua Zwrtq Revg.
13.15: mo-se ziuj lu-Ben fivj Eei puvb pwrng Paaiq Dau penj ninb Bua Ripg Eei pwrng.
13.13: mq paag i-saa-laa-en myenb maiq zung ke-su myenb Zauj maa-aa-Kaa myenb Zwrtq. ke-su myenb, maa-aa-Kaa myenb zyrug yem i-saa-laa-en myenb Bu'Dovj Tauj ib Jaaj Nxi.
13.1: yo-su-waa Eei Havb Jeiq Lav, koj haig a'q. zyruq kxvq Buaj ninb, “meib Eei Havb Jeiq Lav, koj haig a'q. xij zu'g Rcv Eei teib puv Zxg cvj maaib Javq Eei.
13.26: ninb Bua Eei kapg Jaaij yaag yem hetq-Bon zivb mivb Tauj laa-maatq-mitq-pe muvq Zauj Be-To-nim muvq, yaag yem maa-haa-naa-im zivb mivb Tauj De-Bi zivb Eei kapg Jaaij.
13.25: ninb Bua Eei teib puv yem yaa-se muvq Zauj ki-le-aatg teig Eei nxmb nxm zivb, lyemb am-mon myenb Eei yetg pwrng teib puv, mivb Tauj lapq-Baa zivb tov puv mcvj, aa-lo-e zivb.

1.18: haiq taub vcvg Jyenq meib hatg Eei waag, yaag maiq ei Jyenq meib Eei waag zruj, maiq kunq meib Paaiq ninb zruj haiq Euvg, uaq taub zuvq xij zu'g taig a'q. meib Kuvj xij zu'g henq yaag zuvj Jyenq taamq.
1.3: ta'faanb meib Bua Eei zaub penq Zaaiq Eei nxmb nxm txvj, yia xij Jiu pun meib Bua Revg, Navq yia Zauj mo-se lcvd Jiaj uaq nx.
1.8: maiq tuvq la'Ku'q zanb zang to'g naaiq pwrnq leib latg sru. Dxmb Dxm mwrnb mwrnd xij zu'g feib favq, weig pun meib faij fim ei Jyenq sru fiaq Eei yetg zuvq waag. Navq naaig meib zruj Eei Euvb Euvg zyrug zruj tu'q lovj yaag zruj tu'q tunb yunb.
1.9: yia hatg liud meib maiq zeid? meib xij zu'g henq yaag zuvj Jyenq taamq. maiq tuvq kamb Riaj yaag maiq tuvq Hruq namj, weig zu'g maiq kunq meib mivb Tauj haaij, zyruq, meib Eei Tinb huvb, Zauj meib yem.”
1.7: meib xij zu'g henq yaag zuvj Jyenq tomb taamq. xij zu'g faij fim ei Jyenq yia Eei pru, mo-se, Jiu pun Eei yetg zuvq leib latg, maiq tuvq puvj Dxtq yetg tiub, weig pun meib, maiq kunq mivb Tauj haaij, haib tu'q lovj.
1.5: yem meib Eei seij zeiq maiq maaib haiq taub haib Bx'q tu'q hivb meib. yia Navq haiq nx Zauj mo-se yem, yia yaag xij Navq uaq nx Zauj meib yem. yia zuvq maiq leib Gxi meib, yaag maiq kwavg meib.
1.16: ninb Bua tau yo-su-waa, “meib heug yia Bua zruj Eei yetg zuvq, yia Bua zyrug zruj a'q. meib Paaiq yia Bua mivb haiq Dau, yia Bua zyrug mivb a'q.
1.17: yia Bua zinb Daavg yem maang sig Navq haiq nx mwavj mo-se Eei waag, ib zang yaag Navq uaq nx xij mwavj meib Eei waag. Kuvj Toq zyruq, meib Eei Tinb huvb, Zauj meib yem Navq ninb zinb Daavg Zauj mo-se yem uaq nx.
1.14: meib Bua Eei auq, meib Bua Eei fu'Jweiq Zauj scvb Kuq yem Jyenq naaiq Jx-Dcn Daaib tov puv, tovb mo-se Paaiq pun meib Bua Eei teib puv tu'q Eei. mq paag yem meib Bua Bu'Dovj yetg zuvq haib Bx'q Jaaj Eei mJavg txn xij zu'g txb Jyenq ua'g king Jiaj Daaib mivb Daavg Tevj meib Bua Eei kxb yrud Bx'q Jaaj,
1.4: meib Bua Eei kapg Jaaij zyrug yem naamb puv Eei teib puvb Waav mivb Tauj pa'q puv le-Baa-nxn keb, yaag yem tov puv yu-fe-titg tomb Daaib, se hitq-Tai myenb Eei yetg zuvq teib puv, cvj mivb Tauj Ba'Nxi Dxtq mcvj Eei tomb Kxiq.
1.2: “yia Eei pru, mo-se, kwei seij mig a'q. ib zang meib xij zu'g Jiad taaib. meib Zauj naaiq teij yetg zuvq pc'g fivj xij zu'g Jiaj Jx-Dcn Daaib, pia'g yia xij Jiu pun ninb Bua, se pun i-saa-laa-en myenb, uaq nxm teib puv.
1.6: “meib xij zu'g henq yaag zuvj Jyenq taamq, weig zu'g meib zuvq xij pun naaiq teij pc'g fivj tu'q uaq nxm teib puv penj ninb Bua Ripg Eei pwrng, tovb yia Zauj ninb Bua Eei ovb Taaij hruq Jyenq xij Jiu pun ninb Bua uaq nxm teib puv.
1.13: “xij zu'g Javj Jyenq zyruq Eei pru, mo-se, Buaj meib Bua Eei waag. ninb kxvq, ‘zyruq, meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb, liug leid zyavj txvj pun meib Bua hitq Kwrnj yaag Jiu naaiq nxm teib puv pun meib Bua.’
1.12: yo-su-waa kxvq Buaj lu-Ben myenb, kaatg myenb Zauj maa-natq-sej Daamb fivj myenb,
1.15: zuaq zyruq pun ninb Bua Navq meib Bua nx, tu'q hitq Kwrnj yaag tu'q Ripg tovb zyruq, meib Bua Eei Tinb huvb, Jiu pun weig penj ninb Bua Eei pwrng teib puv. Ga'haaq meib Bua haib Rwrnj taaib yem meib Bua kanb Eei teib puv, tovb zyruq Eei pru, mo-se, Jiu pun meib Bua yem Jx-Dcn Daaib tov puv mcvj, se yem Ba'Nxi Zwrtq mcvj Eei teib puv.”
